Utilities.description:
Utilities: Forgot a utility? 
 Read about them: 

 https://deploy-preview-29017--twbs-bootstrap.netlify.app/docs/5.0/utilities/api/

Padding / Margin.description: Quickly add Padding & Margins any class.

Color.description: Quickly add color utility classes to any class.

Font.description: Quickly add font utility classes to any class.

body: ${9:Left aligned text on all viewport sizes.}
${10:Left aligned text on all viewport sizes.}

Flex Utility.description:
Flex Utility: Create a flexbox container and transform direct children elements into flex items. 

 Ends with an options to continue with other flex utilities,!direction,!justify,!align.

Flex Direction.description: Flex Direction: Set the direction of flex items in a flex container with direction utilities

justify-content.description:
justify-content: 
 change the alignment of flex items on the main axis (the x-axis to start, y-axis if flex-direction: column) 
 Read the docs: 

 https://deploy-preview-29017--twbs-bootstrap.netlify.app/docs/5.0/utilities/flex/#justify-content

Flex-Align.description:
Flex-Align: 
 Read the docs: 
 https://deploy-preview-29017--twbs-bootstrap.netlify.app/docs/5.0/utilities/flex/#align-items 

 1. align-items: change the alignment of flex items on the cross axis (the y-axis to start, x-axis if flex-direction: column) 

  2. align-self: change their alignment on the cross axis (the y-axis to start, x-axis if flex-direction: column) 

 3. align-content: align flex items together on the cross axis. 

 NOTE: CENTER & AROUND only apply to align Content.

!fill.description: !fill - use on sibling elements to force them into widths equal to their content

!grow-shrink.description: !grow-shrink - utilities to toggle a flex item’s ability to grow to fill available space

!flex-wrap.description: !flex-wrap - utilities to toggle a flex item’s ability to grow to fill available space.

!flex-order.description: Flex Order - Change the visual order of specific flex items with a handful of order utilities.
